snippet.title: Double Fine Presents: Escape Goat 2 by MagicalTimeBean
snippet.description:
Escape Goat 2 is a puzzle platformer game where you use machinery, the environment, and a friendly mouse to progress through a dungeon. Developed by MagicalTimeBean and presented by Double Fine Productions, Escape Goat is now available for PC, Mac, and Linux at http://www.escapegoat2.com/buy.html

This is the first externally developed game published by Double Fine Productions. To talk with Double Fine about them helping with your awesome game email indies@doublefine.com
